title: BALANCE Crystal Kit
cleaned_text: of Heart Chakra crystals to help you find BALANCE. Crystals usually include*: - Emerald Small Tumbled - Green Aventurine Tumbled - Jade Tumbled - Rose Aura Quartz Tumbled - Rose Quartz Tumbled Also includes a matching chip bracelet and collectable Chakra Card. [Selenite Charging Plate](https://chakrascents.com.au/product/seleniteplate/) NOT included. The Collection is packaged in a biodegradable and reusable zip-lock bag. *Should any individual stone be unavailable it will be replaced with a similar crystal. Also available: [BALANCE Soy Wax Candle](https://chakrascents.com.au/product/balancecandle/)
